name: GRAVKICK
description:
SUMMARY

You turned off the gravity generator you fool! Try to make your way to the switch by kicking yourself off of surfaces. avoid the dreaded cosmoss and risk endlessly floating in space.

Oh God what have I done + A Platformer without Gravity

USED ASSETS

Industrial Tileset

Space background

SFX made with SFXR

ADDED/CHANGED IN v2.0

- Updated level layout and envioronmental visuals

- Fixed bug where the player was able to move after death and victory

- Added SFX and a music track

- Added gravity after the player reaches the end for narrative reasons
